tableDescription: This table is a copy of the OMOP Location_History table.
userGuidance: Copy the OMOP Location_History table to Gaia to facilitate creation of CDM Extension tables
etlConventions: This table should be an exact duplicate of the OMOP Location_History table.

tableDescription: This CDM Extension table is used to represent person-related transformations of data from Gaia and to interface with ATLAS and OHDSI tool stack from an OMOP CDM database.
